StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [InsertOrUpdateLodgingInfo]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
-- PointOfContactID is null for inserts @PointOfContactID uniqueiden..er, @SchoolCode int, @FiscalYear int, @En.tyTitle varchar(60), @Street1 varchar(40), @Street2 varchar(40), @City varchar(20), @State varchar(3), @ZipCode varchar(9), @TelephoneNumber varchar(12), @FaxNumber varchar(12), @EmailAddress varchar(40), @Cost numeric, @UserLogin varchar(50), @CityCode varchar(4) = null, @CountyCode varchar(3) = null, @StateCode varchar(2) = null
AS SET NOCOUNT ON
--ENTITY TYPEID is 6
--IMPORTANT NOTE: Add begin and end transac.on
--Join with CollegePro.le to ensure only valid school_codes are entered in the PointOfContact table IF EXISTS (SELECT '1' from [USMC].PointOfContact pc
--inner join CollegePro.le cpr on cpr.School_Code = pc.School_Code where PointOfContactID = @PointOfContactID and @PointOfContactID IS NOT NULL)
-- then update the exisi.ng record BEGIN
UPDATE [MCRISS].[USMC].[PointOfContact] SET --Once inserted, these .eld cannot be updated by the user --instead the record can be deleted -- [SCHOOL_CODECode] = @SchoolCode, [En.tyTitle] = @En.tyTitle, [Street1] = @Street1, [Street2] = @Street2, [City] = @City, [State]= @State, [ZipCode] = @ZipCode, [TelephoneNumber] = @TelephoneNumber, [FaxNumber] = @FaxNumber, [EmailAddress] = @EmailAddress, [Cost] = @Cost, [UserLogin] = @UserLogin, [UpdateDate] = GetDate(), [City_Code] = @CityCode, [County_Code] = @CountyCode, [State_Code] = @StateCode where PointOfContactID = @PointOfContactID
END
--- ELSE PROCEED WITH INSERT ELSE BEGIN
INSERT INTO [MCRISS].[USMC].[PointOfContact] ([PointOfContactID], --[SCHOOL_CODE], [En.tyTitle], [En.tyTypeID], [Street1], [Street2],[City], [State],[ZipCode],[TelephoneNumber], [FaxNumber],[EmailAddress],[Cost],[UserLogin], [UpdateDate], CITY_CODE, COUNTY_CODE, STATE_CODE)
VALUES (@PointOfContactID, @En.tyTitle, 2, @Street1,@Street2,@City,@State,@ZipCode,@TelephoneNumber, @FaxNumber,@EmailAddress,@Cost,@UserLogin, GetDate(), @CityCode, @CountyCode, @StateCode)
END --- CLEAN UP SET NOCOUNT OFF
